description: Try our easy to follow Tim Tam Slam BBQ Hot Cross Bun recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot cross buns,Seafood free,Low salt,Raspberry,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,High fibre,Chocolate,Easter
name: Tim Tam Slam BBQ Hot Cross Bun Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs hazelnuts, roughly chopped and roasted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue flat plate on medium heat. Place hot cross buns cut side down on flat plate and cook for 3-4 minutes or until toasted. Transfer to a serving plate.
Cover bottom halves of hot cross buns with 1 tbs of hazelnut spread. Top with strawberries, raspberries and chopped hazelnuts.
Add a pinch of salt to melted chocolate and stir to combine. Place top half of buns on berries, then drizzle with melted chocolate and sprinkle over crushed biscuits.
